author: Dusan - lunarpool.io
title: HW wallet passphrase recovery tool
description: Currently there is no public tool supporting Cardano allowing BIP39 passphrase to be guessed/tested. Plus none using GPU acceleration.

assessments.note: To aid in the ecosystem of the developers I am not sure that this is the project, but to aid in creation of the tools developers have, it surly does
I didn't know that such tools can exist, and if it does it would be a great addition.
Having ties to the people needed to make this happen is a big plus, and responding to the needs and requests of their SP constituents is awesome
there is very less information about the team and deliverable timeline in this proposal.
Hard for me to speak technically on this, The Proposal is well written and those who understand this will vote appropriately
this proposal if successful is one of the most bang for buck proposal. But execution framework and team information was missing as per my opinion.

solution: Add Cardano (ADA) support and GPU acceleration support to widely used and publicly known tool named btcrecover.
experience: As a SPO we were asked to help an ADA holder with this issue and there are more to come for sure. There's no such tool at the moment.
